name: 王伯雅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1 0911-0916	Orientation Unit 1
Week 2 0918-0923	Unit 1 & Unit 2
Week 3 0925-0930	Unit 2
Week 4 1002-1007	Mooncake 10/04
Week 5 1009-1014	Unit 3
Week 6 1016-1021	Unit 3
Week 7 1023-1028	Unit 4
Week 8 1030-1104	Project Discussion +Practical English
Week 9 1106-1111	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
Week 10 1113-1118	Unit 4
Week 11 1120-1125	Unit 5
Week 12 1127-1202	Unit 5&Unit 6
Week 13 1204-1209	Unit 6
Week 14 1211-1216	Project Discussion +Practical English
Week 15 1218-1223	 Review
Week 16 1225-1230	Group Presentation 
Week 17 0101-0106	Textbook Exam
Week 18 0108-0113	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
	 Class attendance (15%) 
	 Quiz and in-class participation (20%): Vocabulary+ Dialogue+ In-class activity
	 Final Project (20%: within-group evaluation 10%)
	 Exams (45%): Textbook Final Exam 15% +Midterm 15% +Final 15%
